title: Forever Again
description: A sweet romance about a second chance at love...As teenagers, Gena Taylor and Travis Ryan were forced into a marriage neither wanted, the price they paid after one night of passion. But what he believed to be a lie forced Travis to walk out of her life shortly thereafter, crushing Gena's dreams of a happily ever after with the boy she loved.Now itâ€™s fifteen years later and Travis is back. Only now, Gena owns the inn he's considering for his upcoming wedding. Despite their resolve to keep things impersonal, the past comes rushing back and feelings Gena thought long dead rise from the ashes. But there are other lives at stake now, including that of the child Travis once thought was a lie.Forever Again is 52,000 words and was previously published under the same title. No changes have been made to the story.
author: Shannon Stacey
